name: Word Crush - Social Game
description:
If you are a crush game enthusiast and active on social platform, I bet you don’t want to miss this game. Word Crush is a social word game on the basic of match and crush word puzzle game. In Word Crush, you can enjoy fun, free word game that lets you connect with friends and families while expanding your vocabulary. Meanwhile, you will feel relax and decompress as your fingers sliding on letter blocks and crush the right words you have spell out.

——————Features——————
-It’s a social game， in which you can play together with both real and internet friends. Playing while connecting with others.

-Launch or accept challenges from friends.

-Different from other word games, Word Crush is not simple word cross game. It fuses classic word game with the gameplay method of crush game. One game, two experiences.

-Besides vertical and horizontal, players can slide letters in all directions.

-Brand New Duel mode. Players who take over the multiple blocks can get double the score. It makes the game more exciting and thrilling.
-Special game elements. Use glasses to have another action.

——————How to Play——————
-Create a new round or join a round established by other players.

-Two players in the same round will take actions alternately, slide the right letters to crush words. Player with the higher score will win.

-Crush words in multiple lattices will get more scores.

-The round will be automatically close after 24 hours if there is no response.

-After an action, click the Submit button and wait until the opponent is finished.
-Each letter in a word have different points. Numbers on bottom right corner of each letter refers to its points. Try to crush words with more points to get a higher score.
-Letters with “xn” on top right corner are power score letters. Players can get n times of the score after crush the words with “xn” sign.

——————Special Game Props——————
• STAR: use star to replace any one of the letters.

• SHUFFLE: shuffle to rearrange the order of all letters.

• ADD：use add to get 5 more moves.

Come and try this amazing free social word game.

Note: Word Crush is free to play; however, in-game purchases are available for additional content and in-game currency.
